snippet: The Fed said the minutes of its policy committee’s last meeting were inadvertently distributed a day early to more than 100 Congressional staff members and trade organization officials.
lead_paragraph: The Fed said the minutes of its policy committee’s last meeting were inadvertently distributed a day early to more than 100 Congressional staff members and trade organization officials.

headline.main: Fed Says Minutes Were Inadvertently Released
headline.print_headline: Fed Says Minutes Were Inadvertently Released
